text:
I would like to work in journalism all around the world, for discover new cultures, new people. I have always this idea in my head but each time an another job took over. But they are 3 times, a tacher make me remark on my speech and she asked me if i wanted to be a journalist. this sentence made me so happy that i informed a little more about this job. Moreover, with the 2020 cesar's with Alex Dupont, i was interested in the articles and they were all treated the same way. And many articles defended Alex Dupont while the journalist is supposed to be neutral. i wanted to had society opinions on this subject and not just one. But my professional big dream is to animate a talk show like Alex Dupont or go to film fesivals and be able to interview actors, directors...
For conclure, I want to travel, to interview celebrity or just a normal people, debate with people...
 This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here
